short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a tooltip with all CSS properties of elements on hover.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over any element to instantly view its unique ID and class. Click on an element to access detailed information at a glance. Easily copy the element details and integrate them directly into your code for a seamless development experience.
